A being made entirely of light, capable of changing color and shape at will, and able to communicate telepathically.
A creature with a flexible, translucent body that can change its size and shape at will, and has the ability to manipulate matter with its thoughts.
A being that exists entirely in a digital realm, able to interact with physical objects through a virtual reality interface.
A creature with the ability to manipulate time, able to slow it down or speed it up as needed, and has the ability to see and communicate with other beings from different eras.
A being that exists as a swarm of tiny, interconnected organisms, able to work together to form complex structures and perform tasks beyond the capabilities of a single individual.
